entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6 except minus 3 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then becoming west 20 near midnight. Low minus 6 except minus 3 along parts of the coast. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 1.
